import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from 'src/app/services/food.service'; import { Food } from 'src/app/shared/models/Food'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { foods:Food[] = []; constructor(private foodService:FoodService){ this.foods = foodService.getAll(); } ngOnInit(): void{ } }
